headline: Bristol Myers Pops On A 'Surprisingly Positive' Update From Key Rival Bayer
summary: Bayer issued a "surprisingly positive" report for its blood thinner over the weekend, prodding Bristol Myers Squibb stock higher on Monday.

raw.headline: Bristol Myers Pops On A 'Surprisingly Positive' Update From Key Rival Bayer
raw.summary: Bayer issued a "surprisingly positive" report for its blood thinner over the weekend, prodding Bristol Myers Squibb stock higher on Monday.

headline: 1 Reason Why Shares of Regeneron Pharmaceuticals Are Surging This Month
summary: Markets are dipping lower this month, but positive news from the FDA has this biotech stock ripping higher.

raw.headline: 1 Reason Why Shares of Regeneron Pharmaceuticals Are Surging This Month
